Some new traitor weapons & items:

Rick Roll: Use it on a player to Rick Roll them.
Banshee: Right click to mark a location(Like the Teleporter) Left click to play a terrible screaching noise where you marked your location.
Mines: Boom.
Tear Gas: Like the smoke grenade, but lasts longer, hurts, and is much thicker.
Night Vision Goggles: Let's you see in the dark a little better.

Some new detective weapons & items:

Revival Kit: Allows you to revive one player. Only allows you one use.
Mine Sweeper: Sweeps for mines.
Backstab Shield: Protects you from one knife attack.

Some new features:

Detectives should be able to buy Body Armor.




Tell me what you think about these suggestions  ;)
